actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Committee on Governmental Affairs requested executive comment from GAO, CBO, OMB.
Committee on Governmental Affairs received executive comment from GAO.

official_title: A bill to amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Control Act of 1985 to exempt certain programs, projects, and activities of the Library of Congress, the National Endowment for the Humanities, and the Department of Education from sequestration or reduction under an order issued by the President under section 252 of such Act.
subjects: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

summary.text: Amends the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (Gramm-Rudman-Hollings Act) to exempt certain programs, projects, and activities of the Library of Congress, the National Endowment for the Humanities, and the Department of Education from reduction under a sequestration order issued by the President.

titles.title: A bill to amend part C of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Control Act of 1985 to exempt certain programs, projects, and activities of the Library of Congress, the National Endowment for the Humanities, and the Department of Education from sequestration or reduction under an order issued by the President under section 252 of such Act.
